applicationId.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionMigrateConnectedApp.inputConnectedAppIdLabel}
applicationId.einstein:description: The ID of the connected app to migrate to an external client app in the connected app page in Setup.

isAppOnlyUsedInThisOrg.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionMigrateConnectedApp.inputIsAppOnlyUsedInThisOrgLabel}
isAppOnlyUsedInThisOrg.einstein:description: Only local connected apps can be migrated. The user must confirm that the connected app is used only in this org. This response determines if the connected app is eligible for migration.

doesAppUseUsernamePasswordFlow.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionMigrateConnectedApp.inputDoesAppUseUsernamePasswordFlowLabel}
doesAppUseUsernamePasswordFlow.einstein:description: Connected apps that use OAuth 2.0 Username-Password flow can't be migrated to external client apps. External client apps don't support that flow. The user must state that the connected app doesn't use OAuth 2.0 Username-Password flow. The response from the user determines if the connected app is eligible for migration.

proceedMigration.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionMigrateConnectedApp.inputProceedMigrationLabel}
proceedMigration.einstein:description: The user must confirm that they want to continue with the migration process.
